attributes.action: Clean air zone for suburbs outside of Birmingham city centre
attributes.background: Vehicles will be driven out of central Birmingham because of clean air charges  , Making the suburbs even more congested than it is , Increasing the pollution to the people that live on and around the ring roads and main roads that lead off them , This is going to cause serious health issues .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Birmingham City Council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
